p: Suriname and African MR766 ZIKV strains provided by the European EVAg project were used in the present work. The Suriname ZIKV strain (EVAg no. 011V-01621; Asian lineage) was isolated from a placental material of a patient in Netherlands in 2016 who came from Suriname during the ZIKV epidemic [ 29] and the African MR766 ZIKV strain (African I lineage) was isolated from a rhesus monkey ( Macaca mulatta) in 1947 in Uganda [ 13]. These strains were propagated and titrated to obtain the 50% tissue culture infective dose per ml (TCID 50/ml) in African green monkey kidney (VERO) cells.
